```{r}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
# leaflet map
map %>% leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addTiles(group = "Open Street Maps") %>% 
  addCircleMarkers( 
    data = map, radius = 10, 
    popup = map$name) %>% 
  setView(lng = -71.47275, lat = 42.24943, zoom = 7.5)
```
